__name__s.title: First item in __Proper__
__name__s.message: Do you see any Teletubbies in here? Do you see a slender plastic tag clipped to my shirt with my name printed on it?

__name__s.title: Second item in __Proper__
__name__s.message: You think water moves fast? You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind.

__name__s.title: Third item in __Proper__
__name__s.message: Yeah, I like animals better than people sometimes... Especially dogs. Dogs are the best. Every time you come home, they act like they haven't seen you in a year.
